name: Paint: Reveal!
description:
The EVOLUTION of paint by numbers and coloring books!

See paintings UNLOCK right before your eyes! Enjoy the anticipation of what the paintings reveal.

Join players from all over the world in this relaxing experience. See paintings unlock before your eyes. Cats, dogs, nature, cities, flowers, animals, towns... Lots of paintings and more coming on a regular basis.

Features:

- Easy to paint: just tap to paint, no need to select a color
- See the painting unlock before your eyes
- Relax and enjoy
- Optimized for the newest iPhones
- Easily share your drawings in social networks
- Works offline! No wifi needed!
